Html: IIR, they nerfed the T5 set bonus to +5% to damage and mana cost on AB, down from +20%.
Ah, I just noticed that Kavan did in fact make the change to the code a while back. But the tooltip still says "0.2 Arcane Blast Bonus," so that should probably be fixed.

It is using the new 5% value, just the tooltip is not updated. This is because for some time I was supporting both pre 3.0 and 3.0 modes at the same time. I'll change the tooltip now to make sure this is clear.
